question_sentence: Which city saw widespread immigration raids this week?
evidence: The immigration enforcement operation in the Charlotte area this week resulted in more than 250 arrests of undocumented immigrants, according to the Department of Homeland Security.

question_sentence: How many days was the Justice Department given to release all of the Epstein files?
evidence: After President Donald Trump signed legislation to release the Epstein files on Wednesday, the Justice Department was instructed to comply within 30 days.

question_sentence: A rare painting sold for $236 million at auction this week. Who was the artist behind the record-setting piece?
evidence: Gustav Klimt’s “Portrait of Elisabeth Lederer” became the most valuable work of modern art ever sold at auction, fetching $236.4 million.

question_sentence: Which illness could be more severe in the US this year due to a new virus variant and low vaccination rates?
evidence: Health experts say the US may be heading into a severe flu season, driven by a mutated strain called subclade K that’s behind early surges in the UK, Canada and Japan.

question_sentence: President Trump has promised to send tariff rebate checks to Americans next year in which of the following amounts?
evidence: The Trump administration has promised $2,000 tariff rebate checks to millions of Americans next year — but experts question whether the plan is feasible due to several major obstacles.

question_sentence: Which basketball player holds the record for the longest career in NBA history?
evidence: Los Angeles Lakers star LeBron James began his 23rd season in the NBA this week, marking the longest career in NBA history.

question_sentence: Who was invited to the White House this week for a lavish state visit?
choices: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman
evidence: President Trump welcomed Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman to the White House with military bands, a flyover of fighter jets and a line of mounted horses.

question_sentence: Which cryptocurrency recently lost all of its gains for the year?
evidence: Just six weeks after notching a record high above $126,000, bitcoin recently erased all of its gains for this year.

question_sentence: What is Cambridge Dictionary's 2025 word of the year?
evidence: Cambridge Dictionary has named “parasocial” as its word of the year for 2025. The word is used to describe a connection that people feel with someone they don’t know – or even with an artificial intelligence.

question_sentence: What is widely considered the biggest annual event in the fashion world?
evidence: The Met Gala is often called "fashion's biggest night.” This week, the Met Museum announced that its 2026 Met Gala theme is “Costume Art.”
